headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Caterpillar (CAT) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Caterpillar's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. That is exactly what this article will unpack for you. With the stock at US$623.09 after returns of 7.9% over 7 days, 3.3% over 30 days, 4.1% year to date, 74.2% over 1 year, 161.8% over 3 years and 246.9% over 5 years, many investors are asking how much of the story is already reflected in the price. Recent commentary around Caterpillar has focused on how large capital goods...

headline: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: Strategy, Applied Digital, Chevron
summary: ↗️ Strategy (MSTR): Shares of the bitcoin-accumulation company climbed 5% premarket after index provider MSCI said it won't exclude crypto treasury companies from its indexes. ↘️ Newmont (NEM), Freeport-McMoRan (FCX), Antofagasta (UK: ANTO): Global mining stocks came under pressure as a rally in precious and industrial metals stalled.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: Strategy, Applied Digital, Chevron
content.summary: ↗️ Strategy (MSTR): Shares of the bitcoin-accumulation company climbed 5% premarket after index provider MSCI said it won't exclude crypto treasury companies from its indexes. ↘️ Newmont (NEM), Freeport-McMoRan (FCX), Antofagasta (UK: ANTO): Global mining stocks came under pressure as a rally in precious and industrial metals stalled.

headline: Caterpillar (CAT): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: What a fantastic six months it’s been for Caterpillar. Shares of the company have skyrocketed 59.4%, hitting $624.00. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Caterpillar Teams With NVIDIA to Revolutionize Heavy Industry with Physical AI and Robotics
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) today announced an expanded collaboration with NVIDIA to drive innovation across industries through next-generation, AI-enhanced customer solutions and manufacturing systems. This engagement will transform how work gets done for Caterpillar's customers, dealers and employees.

headline: Caterpillar taps Nvidia to bring AI to its construction equipment
summary: Caterpillar is piloting Cat AI, a system of AI agents in one of its excavators built on Nvidia's physical AI platform.

headline: Caterpillar Unveils AI-Powered Future and Invests in the Workforce Building It
